item.title: Unified Security Summary: Enhancing Visibility and Value
item.description: In today's rapidly evolving threat landscape, security teams are constantly working to reduce risks and remediate threats. However, the sheer volume of vulnerabilities and incidents can make it challenging to communicate progress and value to stakeholders. Security teams often spend countless hours managing vulnerabilities and incidents, leaving little time for building and sharing progress reports. This can result in stakeholders being uninformed about the security team's efforts and achievements.
